stealth_weapons.name: Stealth Weapons
stealth_weapons.effect: Shooting while cloaked doesn't decrease cloaking time.

repair_arm.name: Repair Arm
repair_arm.effect: Repairs 1-2 hull every time you pick up scrap, but scrap rewards are decreased by 15%.

longranged_scanners.name: Long-Ranged Scanners
longranged_scanners.effect: Warns of ships and hazards in adjacent systems.

automated_reloader.name: Automated Re-Loader
automated_reloader.effect: Cooldown on weapons is decreased by 10%.

weapon_preigniter.name: Weapon Pre-igniter
weapon_preigniter.effect: All powered weapons are ready to shoot after an FTL jump.

adv_ftl_navigation.name: Adv. FTL Navigation
adv_ftl_navigation.effect: The ship can jump to any previously visited beacon.

drone_recovery_arm.name: Drone Recovery Arm
drone_recovery_arm.effect: Drone parts are recovered after a battle if the drone was not destroyed. Does not include Boarding or Hull Repair Drones

crystal_vengeance.name: Crystal Vengeance
crystal_vengeance.effect: Every time your ship takes damage, there is a 10 percent chance to break off a shard that flies at your enemy.

zoltan_shield.name: Zoltan Shield
zoltan_shield.effect: An additional shield that can take 5 damage, stops missiles, and prevents boarding/mind control. Takes twice the damage from ion weapons.

engi_medbot_dispersal.name: Engi Med-bot Dispersal
engi_medbot_dispersal.effect: While med-bay is powered all crew is healed at 1/4 base rate. Does not increase with Med-Bay upgrades.

lifeform_scanner.name: Lifeform Scanner
lifeform_scanner.effect: Show location of hidden lifeforms on enemy ship even when sensors are down

zoltan_shield_bypass.name: Zoltan Shield Bypass
zoltan_shield_bypass.effect: Allows teleporting and mind control through Super Shields

defense_drone_scrambler.name: Defense Drone Scrambler
defense_drone_scrambler.effect: Disrupts targeting by enemy Defense Drones

backup_dna_bank.name: Backup DNA Bank
backup_dna_bank.effect: Crew that dies won't be lost if Cloning Bay is down

battery_charger.name: Battery Charger
battery_charger.effect: Decrease Backup battery recharge time by 50%

fire_suppression.name: Fire Suppression
fire_suppression.effect: Automatically puts out fires on ship

explosive_replicator.name: Explosive Replicator
explosive_replicator.effect: Missile based weapons have a 50% chance of not using a missile

distraction_buoys.name: Distraction Buoys
distraction_buoys.effect: Delays Rebels 1 jump at start of each sector

hacking_stun.name: Hacking Stun
hacking_stun.effect: Add stun effect to Hacking system activation

reconstructive_teleport.name: Reconstructive Teleport
reconstructive_teleport.effect: Heals crewmembers to full with each teleport
